Properties.Value: Specifies the VAT due on sales and other outputs. This corresponds to box 1 on the VAT Return form.

Properties.Value: Specifies the VAT due on acquisitions from other EC Member States. This corresponds to box 2 on the VAT Return form.

Properties.Value: Specifies the total VAT due (the sum of "VAT Due Sales" and "VAT Due Acquisitions"). This corresponds to box 3 on the VAT Return form.

Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies the difference between "Total VAT Due" and "VAT Reclaimed Curr Period". This corresponds to box 5 on the VAT Return form.

Properties.Value: Specifies the yotal value of sales and all other outputs excluding any VAT. This corresponds to box 6 on the VAT Return form.

Properties.Value: Specifies the total value of purchases and all other inputs excluding any VAT (including exempt purchases). This corresponds to box 7 on the VAT Return form.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies the total value of acquisitions of goods and related costs excluding any VAT, from other EC member states. This corresponds to box 9 on the VAT Return form.
